mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_id, g.goods_name, gd.img_path, gd.img_name, o.delivery_fee, o.total_amount, o.delivery_num, o.delivery_company, o.delivery_status, m.name, m.phone_num, m.zone_code, m.road_address, m.detail_address FROM ORDERS o JOIN GOODS g ON g.goods_id = o.goods_id JOIN GOODS_DESCRIPTION_IMG gd ON gd.goods_id = o.goods_id JOIN MEMBER m ON m.member_id = o.member_id WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND member_id = #{memberId} AND gd.img_position = 1

SELECT order_id, order_created_at, order_items, total_amount, member_id, nickname, delivery_num FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, order_id, order_created_at, order_items, total_amount, member_id, nickname, delivery_num FROM( SELECT o.order_id, o.order_created_at, LISTAGG(i.item_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY oi.order_items_id) AS order_items, o.total_amount, m.member_id, m.nickname, o.delivery_num FROM ORDERS o JOIN ORDER_ITEMS oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN ITEM i ON oi.item_id = i.item_id JOIN MEMBER m ON m.member_id = o.member_id WHERE o.goods_id = #{goodsId} GROUP BY o.order_id, o.order_created_at, o.total_amount, m.member_id, m.nickname, o.delivery_num ) )
WHERE rn > (#{pageRequest.pageNum} - 1) * #{pageRequest.amount} AND rn <= #{pageRequest.pageNum} * #{pageRequest.amount}
